abstract: Okaloosa County, Fla,  Deputy Bill Myers is fatally shot by Joel Dixon Smith outside lawyer's office; Smith fled to hotel where he was eventually killed in exchange of gunfire with deputies.
lead_paragraph: A man fatally shot a sheriff’s deputy outside a lawyer’s office Tuesday and then barricaded himself inside a motel, the authorities said.

headline.main: Florida: Man Sought in Slaying of Deputy Is Killed in Shootout
headline.print_headline: Florida: Man Sought in Killing of Deputy Is Killed in Shootout

snippet: A man fatally shot a sheriff’s deputy outside a lawyer’s office Tuesday and then barricaded himself inside a motel, the authorities said.
